subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady and Bill Belichick have been the anchors during the Patriots’ run of excellence. Who expected a quarterback drafted No. 199 and a coach who failed with Cleveland to form such a dynamic duo?
snippet: Tom Brady and Bill Belichick have been the anchors during the Patriots’ run of excellence. Who expected a quarterback drafted No. 199 and a coach who failed with Cleveland to form such a dynamic duo?
